articles.title: Dow Drops 100 Points as Boring Day Gets Less Boring
articles.mainIdea: Dow Drops 100 Points as Boring Day Gets Less Boring
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Dow Drops 100 Points as Boring Day Gets Less Boring. The Dow Jones Industrial Average is taking the brunt of the selling today, despite some good news—perhaps—globally. The Dow has dropped 100.11 points, or 0.2%, just after noon on Friday, while the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite have declined 0.1%. Nothing in the Dow is getting hit all that hard. Related tickers mentioned: BA, CAT, MCD, MSFT, ^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC.

articles.title: “Disney (DIS)’s got good cruises,” Says Jim Cramer
articles.mainIdea: “Disney (DIS)’s got good cruises,” Says Jim Cramer
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: “Disney (DIS)’s got good cruises,” Says Jim Cramer. We recently published 10 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS)’s shares are up by a slight 2% year-to-date.
